content: in this legal case party k ga filed a lawsuit against party gi to demand the division of their joint assets the court reviewed the case and granted the claim the joint assets including an apartment and a vehicle will be divided with k ga becoming the sole owner of the apartment and gi becoming the sole owner of the vehicle gi has also been ordered to pay a monetary compensation of 4500 euros to k ga the court stated that the procedural costs will be borne by the parties the decision is immediately enforceable and the parties have the right to appeal within a certain timeframe the summary also provides an overview of the steps in the case including the initiation of the case submission of the claim response from the defendant scheduling of a hearing and issuance of a decision the specific articles of the legal code referenced in the original text are not provided in the summary

metadata.cost: Each party covers own procedural costs, unspecified amounts
